eventName: Adventure That Cannot Wait for the Sun
storyInfo: As the Gathering approaches, Pepe gets ready for the event in her own way, aiming for her desired prize. Aspasia, too, is vying for a prize with Narantuya's help. In the museum, Anat and Medjehtiqedti have a disagreement on how to run the museum.

attributes.content: Oh, what an honor it is for me to meet you here, Hatshepsut Hanimefendi.
attributes.name: Noble Scholar

attributes.content: The slipper from the early New Calendar era you brought has certainly broadened my knowledge of history. I had no idea the people of so many centuries ago had such fine techniques in crafting footwear.
attributes.name: Noble Scholar

attributes.content: To think they could make a shoe that fits the curve of the foot so well. As for the lotus ornament atop it, vivid beyond words.
attributes.name: Noble Scholar

attributes.content: Not to mention this slipper was made not long after the great explosion, and it reflects the drastic shifts in the local climate.
attributes.name: Noble Scholar

attributes.content: It's a pity that it's missing its twin. I fear it won't win on its own.
attributes.name: Noble Scholar

attributes.content: That's fine, second place is enough for me. It's the participation that counts.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Of course, of course. As daughter of the Padishah, Hatshepsut Hanimefendi, you will one day take up the mantle of Padishah. I am sure such a trifling honor would not be worth fretting over.
attributes.name: Noble Scholar

attributes.content: That's... still a bit early. There's a lot of things we can't say for sure.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I've heard your younger brother has been selected to become court historian, and that he will set out for the City of Gold in two months, Hatshepsut Hanim.
attributes.name: High-status Magnate

attributes.content: Ah, even a girl as talented as Hatshepsut Hanim was not chosen for the post, which just goes to show how gifted her brother is.
attributes.name: Noble Scholar

attributes.content: *sigh* We're practically the same, really.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Are you trying to say, good sir, that becoming a padishah does not require talent and ability? I believe that if Hatshepsut Hanim were to take that position, her family would no doubt continue to bask in glory.
attributes.name: High-status Magnate

attributes.content: This is different. Hatshepsut Hanim's family is Sargon's most illustrious line of historians, after all.
attributes.name: Noble Scholar

attributes.content: Almost time for us to register. Have you thought of what to submit?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: You so brazenly got into line, but you don't have a single treasure on you?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Is there anything about my walking posture that needs improvement?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Never mind, forget it.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I guess you'll have to rely on me again.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I'm not about to let my subordinate lose. Give me some time to think of a plan.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I once won the silver medal in a sprint.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Are you thinking of snatching the golden cup and running? No good.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: These rich folk brought along some tough bodyguards. See the way their feet move as they look around? They've spent time in the ameeri armies.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I also earned a silver medal in an unarmored wrestling.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Robbery? Everyone worth targeting is already here. How would we participate with stolen goods without getting caught?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: There is also the silver medal I got from a ceremonial dance competition.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: That's your plan of attack?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: *sigh* No need to make things hard for yourself...
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: In truth, I have ten silver medals across ten different events. I keep them on my person at all times.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: ...Ten silver medals?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: These medals are embodiments of traditional Minoan culture, and my most prized honors.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Honor should not be regarded as a rarity with which to judge superiority, but in particular circumstances, I have no other choice.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Besides, I hope you do not misunderstand me, Narantuya. I would never resort to anything dishonorable. It would disgrace my family.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I guess I really did misunderstand you.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: *sigh* My competent subordinate, my great endeavor...
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Sorry, did you say something just now?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Nothing important. I was just saying that considering you've never won a gold medal, it's no wonder you want that gold cup, haha.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Don't worry. I have a plan.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: *cough*...
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: May I ask... why the herald led me here? What orders am I to receive?
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: Eh? No, no, no orders here. Just a request.
attributes.name: Woman Behind the Jeweled Screen

attributes.content: If you happen to see a single golden slipper... Do not give it too high a mark.
attributes.name: Woman Behind the Jeweled Screen

attributes.content: Ah, but also not too low! We must still uphold the professionalism of our historians! Let's say... second place. Second place would be good.
attributes.name: Woman Behind the Jeweled Screen

attributes.content: Please! This is really, really important!
attributes.name: Woman Behind the Jeweled Screen

attributes.content: That exhibit has precious historical value, but if you wish to reduce its mark for subjective reasons, that would not be considered unfair to our other competitors.
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: If you have deduced my identity, then please keep that a secret as well. Thank you.
attributes.name: Woman Behind the Jeweled Screen

attributes.content: I will, resplendent Hanim.
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: ...Sorry.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I'm definitely going to apologize to all my teachers and fellow archaeologists after this.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I... I definitely, absolutely, 100% cannot lose, just this once! Why does everyone think I already lost to that little brat?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: AIIEEEEEEEE———!
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: (*covers mouth*) ...Did I scare him?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Did you get all that?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Y-Yes! Th-The set of silver medals from M-Minos... must get a high mark... It will get th-third place...
attributes.name: Terrified Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Don't worry, I already had a talk with most of your fellow judges. We got along rather well. I hope you will too.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Ah... Padishah Effendi... The corrupt must be hanged? F-Forgive me!
attributes.name: Terrified Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: (Can't believe he's this scared already! I didn't get this big a reaction from security and the other judges earlier. What illusion did he see?)
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: (*sigh* I'll be dragging you back to the gate, then. Maybe I overdid it with the Arts?)
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: (Wait. I hear footsteps.)
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Oh, I don't see the judge here either. Must have been escorted back to the meeting hall by security.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I better go get my own things done. The sun waits for no man, after all.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Oho, and who is this I happen to run into? What luck.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Sorry, could you say that one more time?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I am honored to inform you, hanimefendi, that your entry has proceeded to the final round of judging. In other words, you are now in the top three.
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: No, not that. The other part.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I ask that you follow me to the riverside in a little while, where the prizes will be given and the treasures will be immersed into the river.
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: So... You're going to throw my ten silver medals into the river?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Perish the thought, hanimefendi. That would be rather crude, and we would never dare to offend the river god.
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: We will place the treasures atop a small boat made of papyrus reeds, alongside gold, silver, and jewels to help weigh it down. We will sing hymns and chants as we watch the boat slowly sink into the waters.
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: This wasn't mentioned on the brochure.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I am terribly sorry. It was written in the instructions all participants had to sign. The competition's original purpose was to find treasures with the most historical value to knock upon the gate of the god.
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: During the Flood Festival, those favored winners will witness the river god with their own eyes as He wanders the riverside.
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: Forgive me, this was my mistake. It was close to the cutoff when I signed up, and I did not have time to read all ten pages of instructions.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Ah, that is a shame. As it is extremely rare for tourists to reach the final round of selection, you will be given a second opportunity to reaffirm your commitment.
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: Do you wish to continue participating?
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: Narantuya...
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: She hasn't returned yet.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Do you wish to seek a specialist consultant? I can bring you to the chief judge to discuss—
attributes.name: Gathering Staff

attributes.content: No need. What I seek is not a suggestion.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I will continue my participation.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Hello? Anat, listen to me! You can start preparing the victory feast now!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Hm-hm, of course, I would never take for granted the generosity you’ve shown by lending me the general!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I promise you that I'll stick the gem in when we get back tonight. If Zubayr goes through any changes, you'll be able to see them for yourself.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: ...Relax, I've been taking good care of him. No stains or damage, I promise.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: ...Y-You want to speak to him? No, nonono, he... he's under my protection, right? How can I just give him a communicator when everyone's staring at me?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Why don't we talk about something else?! You don't know how hard I've had it! I've been talking up these old pedantic judges all morning just to guarantee second place.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Listen, they're about to declare the winner at the big meeting spot. Once I get the gem, I'll head right back to the museum, where it's nice and quiet—
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Ah, it's fine...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: ...Weird, not like the sidewalk's narrow here.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: *phew* I can finally rest easy. Pepe's handled the gem issue, and Zubayr is just fine too.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Should we have a drink together later?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Is there something you wanted to say?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: You're not going to want to hear it.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I do want to hear your suggestion, Titi.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: You might think this is ridiculous, but... I feel like we might have to start the exhibition over, and keep the accident under wraps.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Just treat it as some sort of performance gone awry, then display it in a more vivid and... true-to-life manner?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: So display a walking mummy and some artifacts, push up ticket prices a little while we're at it?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: More or less, I guess...
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: You do know what our people use to scare crybaby children, right?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: The exhibits being a bit odd isn't a bad thing!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: My old Columbian museum had an exhibit: 'Has Science Gone Too Far? Creative Ideas That Would Be Scarier Successes Than Failures'.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: But Titi, that's the idea behind a business whose number one goal is to make money. If we tried that here, a lot of people would be mad. A lot of people.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: History itself is the foundation of this city!
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Isn't the foundation that vein of gemstones that's nearly dried up?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: You really shouldn't say things like that when we go to meet the nobles later.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: That family is as ancient as the bricks in the tomb in the museum's great hall. They can be rather conservative.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Meddling here and there... What's wrong with those high-ups anyway?! Can't they just fork over a sum of money every year and forget about the museum like Pepe's family?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I worked hard to become acting curator, Titi. I really don't want to cause any sort of inconvenience.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Inconvenience?! You're seriously calling this an 'inconvenience'?!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: That's not what I meant...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Have it your way, then. I'm leaving.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Titi, I...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: (Are you okay? You're sweating buckets...)
attributes.name: Meticulous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: (A-Am I? It's rather hot outside, haha. You're sweating too...)
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: Next up is a descendant of a glorious clan of historians, the one who shares ballads of kings and heroes, explorer of all Sargon, purveyor of knowledge, a respected Padishah's daughter—
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: Hatshepsut Hanim and her rare treasure!
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: (Are you, err... Are you going to announce the result?)
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: (Oh, no, this is a rather important occasion. I leave it to you.)
attributes.name: Meticulous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: (...Haha, well, I guess I can't get out of this one.)
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: Ahem...
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: Uh, this golden slipper is adorned with a lotus flower woven of gold thread, specially designed to accommodate the sudden changes in the Sargonian climate at the time, with distinct characteristics from the era.
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: Not only that, but it comes from an illustrious family of imperial historians.
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: It would be difficult to find a slipper so well-preserved in the marketplace, and it's a submission rather uncharacteristic of a family of historians, at that—
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: For past ceremonies, such families would usually submit letters, manuscripts, and other pieces of writing.
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: But today, this sole slipper reveals to us another side of the life of a noble past. Its value is incalculable!
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: Okay, thank you for the commentary. Next, I will announce the judges' decision.
attributes.name: Ceremony Host
Ceremony Host
attributes.content: Disregarding the highest and the lowest marks, Hatshepsut Hanim's final tally is...

attributes.name: Ceremony Host
attributes.content: —94.95 points.
Ah, what a shame, resplendent Hatshepsut Hanim, off by a mere 0.05 points. You are in second place, for now...
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: This result was born in the interests of fairness and our respect for history. I do hope you understand, Hatshepsut Hanim.
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: Oh, don't worry about it. I expected as much, heheh.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Menat-Ha'mait is honored to undertake your challenge... L-Let's move on to the next item, shall we?
attributes.name: Nervous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: Very well. Next, we have the last, but certainly not the least, entry into our competition...
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: A foreign treasure, a set of silver medals from Minos. We invite our expert to give an assessment.
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: We are all aware that places far from Sargon also possess their own brilliant civilizations. The art and culture of Minos has proven to be harmonious with Sargonian social mores.
attributes.name: Meticulous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: This set of medals embodies not only the Minoan love of sports, but more importantly, unlike most of the other entries, its year of manufacture can be determined with precision.
attributes.name: Meticulous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: Indeed, our lives are well-adorned with gold, but products fashioned from silver are a rarity.
attributes.name: Meticulous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: In fact, some historical periods saw silver considered the more precious metal.
attributes.name: Meticulous Ceremony Judge

attributes.content: What a fascinating analysis! Well then, which three contestants will win the opportunity to represent the city in offering these treasures to the river? Do allow me to announce this particular treasure's score...
attributes.name: Ceremony Host
Ceremony Host
attributes.content: Disregarding the highest and the lowest marks, hailing from Minos, Aspasia Hanim's final tally is...

attributes.name: Ceremony Host
attributes.content: —94.60 points.

This level of fierce competition is unprecedented! Your final position is third place, Aspasia Hanim. Though I regret you did not place higher, you have still secured the chance to perform the offering.
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: I thank you. This was precisely the approval I sought.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: However, if you so permit, I would protest your arrangement of these prizes after we conclude. I believe a golden Minoan goblet should rank higher than a third place prize.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Very well, Hanim, but please come up to the stage first with your treasure. Go with our attendant there.
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: In third place, Aspasia Hanim.
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: In second place, Hatshepsut Hanim.
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: In first place, Rashad Hanim.
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: I ask that our three winning contestants take care not to damage the treasures they are holding—
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: Oh no!
attributes.name: Rashad

attributes.content: Terribly sorry about that. It's far too hot, and I collapsed for a moment... I couldn't hold it steady. This is quite embarrassing.
attributes.name: Rashad

attributes.content: *sigh* It's a pity this ancient clay pot I brought shattered to pieces. I assume that offering pottery chips would be an affront to the river god?
attributes.name: Rashad

attributes.content: I... don't believe this has ever happened before...
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: This is heartbreaking. I fear I will have to give up first place.
attributes.name: Rashad

attributes.content: Resplendent Hatshepsut Hanim, daughter of the Padishah, you hold the highest title among all attendees. To bestow first place upon you is only fitting.
attributes.name: Rashad

attributes.content: And so I voluntarily renounce my position and withdraw from the competition.
attributes.name: Rashad

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Err... What an unexpected turn of events! But I do believe everyone is in agreement that our resplendent daughter of the Padishah should be awarded first place!
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: And so, our second, third and fourth place contestants will become our new first, second, and third place respectively.
attributes.name: Ceremony Host

attributes.content: Let's all give them our heartiest congratulations!
attributes.name: Ceremony Host
